arts.ttl: Wouter Burger double fires Hoffenheim past Wolfsburg and into top six
arts.sum: Wouter Burger scored twice as Hoffenheim climbed to sixth in the Bundesliga table with a 3-2 win over Wolfsburg at the Volkswagen Arena. Wolfsburg's response was swift, with Amoura collecting Saël Kumbedi's clever pass and unleashing a fierce shot past Baumann to make it 2-2, but Burger produced another sublime first-time finish from Prömel's delivery to restore Hoffenheim's lead just six minutes later.

arts.ttl: Burger's winner sees Hoffenheim sink Wolfsburg in five-goal thriller
arts.sum: VfL Wolfsburg and TSG Hoffenheim battled it out in a five-goal thriller to wrap up the action on Bundesliga Matchday 9.

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: VfL Wolfsburg vs. TSG Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Here's how TSG Hoffenheim and VfL Wolfsburg line up for their 17:30pm CET kick-off at the Volkswagen Arena.

arts.ttl: VfL Wolfsburg vs. TSG Hoffenheim: Preview, team news & predicted lineups
arts.sum: Wolfsburg and Hoffenheim will hope to put behind their DFB-Pokal eliminations with a Bundesliga win on Sunday night.
